scenes.description: MC section with Tsunomaki Watane, Takane Lui, and Shirogane Noel discussing synergy and wordplay.
Performance of the song 'Nobishiro' (originally by Creepy Nuts).

subtitles.original: ありまっす？
subtitles.english: Do we have synergy?

subtitles.original: だって... まぁ、女騎士、女幹部、女羊ぐらい。
subtitles.english: Well, we have a female knight, executive, and sheep.

subtitles.original: そうだね。女って付きゃ...
subtitles.english: Right. If you just add "female"...

subtitles.original: 何でもいいみたい。女シナジーはちょっと...
subtitles.english: Seems like anything goes. "Female synergy" is a bit...

subtitles.original: ダメ？
subtitles.english: No good?

subtitles.original: でも、うち等ただの羊... 食べ物になったらいいんじゃない？
subtitles.english:
But we're just sheep...
Wouldn't it be fine if we became food?

subtitles.original: 食べ物になったら？
subtitles.english: If we became food?

subtitles.original: ラム牛丼とか...
subtitles.english: Like a lamb beef bowl...

subtitles.original: 牛丼！あ、シナジー生まれたよ！
subtitles.english: Beef bowl! Oh, synergy was born!

subtitles.original: あ、生まれた！生まれたよ！
subtitles.english: Oh, it's born! It's born!

subtitles.original: 無理矢理... 牛丼なのか羊なのか...
subtitles.english:
You're forcing it...
Is it a beef bowl or a sheep...

subtitles.original: じゃ、私がそれをね、調理すれば...
subtitles.english: Then, if I cook it...

subtitles.original: あ！シナジー！料理に来た！
subtitles.english: Ah! Synergy! She came to cook!

subtitles.original: 生まれた～ 生まれた～
subtitles.english: It's born~ It's born~

subtitles.original: あかんわ～
subtitles.english: This is hopeless~

subtitles.original: 生まれ... リスポーンで生まれた～！
subtitles.english: Born... Born by respawning~!

subtitles.original: いえーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ねー、今後もお待ちしております！
subtitles.english: We're looking forward to more in the future!

subtitles.original: お願いします、ラム丼ラム丼！
subtitles.english: Please, lamb bowl lamb bowl!

subtitles.original: いやいや違う違う違う！
subtitles.english: No, no, no!

subtitles.original: 違うの、このステージでね...
subtitles.english: No, on this stage...

subtitles.original: え、コントじゃないの？
subtitles.english: Wait, it's not a comedy skit?

subtitles.original: 違う、違うよ！
subtitles.english: No, it's not!

subtitles.original: コントじゃないんだ。ごめんね。
subtitles.english: It's not a skit. Sorry.

subtitles.original: ラ、イ、ブ！
subtitles.english: Li-ve!

subtitles.original: あ、ライブ！
subtitles.english: Ah, live!

subtitles.original: ライブ！ライブ！
subtitles.english: Live! Live!

subtitles.original: 次の曲をね、聴いてもらったら、すっげー合うと思ってもらえると思うんだよね！
subtitles.english: If you listen to the next song, I think you'll feel it really fits!

subtitles.original: 我々にシナジーが生まれるんですね。
subtitles.english: So synergy will be born between us.

subtitles.original: そう、化学反応が起こる！
subtitles.english: Yes, a chemical reaction will occur!

subtitles.original: はい、と思うので。行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Right, so. Let's go!

subtitles.original: 行くぞー！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: では聴いてください。のびしろ。
subtitles.english: Then please listen. Nobishiro.

subtitles.original:
のびしろ
作詞: R-指定 作曲: DJ松永
subtitles.english:
Nobishiro
Lyrics: R-Shitei Composer: DJ Matsunaga

subtitles.original: サボり方とか甘え方とか　逃げ方とか言い訳の仕方とか
subtitles.english:
How to slack off, how to be pampered,
how to run away, how to make excuses

subtitles.original: やっと覚えてきた　身につけてきた　柔らかい頭
subtitles.english:
I've finally started to learn,
I've acquired a flexible mind

subtitles.original: 格好の付け方　助詞のこき方　鼻の据え方　愛想の振り方
subtitles.english:
How to look cool, how to use particles,
how to settle my nose, how to act friendly

subtitles.original: 油の乗りだした　煮え滾ってきた　だらしない身体
subtitles.english:
My body is getting greased up, it's starting to boil,
this slovenly body

subtitles.original: 祝われ方や　叱られ方や　下り方とか　綺麗なぶつかり方
subtitles.english:
How to be celebrated, how to be scolded,
how to step down, how to clash beautifully

subtitles.original: もっと覚えたいことが山の様にある
subtitles.english: There's a mountain of things I want to learn

subtitles.original: のびしろしかないわ
subtitles.english: I've got nothing but room to grow

subtitles.original: のびしろしかないわ
subtitles.english: I've got nothing but room to grow

subtitles.original: のびしろしかないわ
subtitles.english: I've got nothing but room to grow

subtitles.original: のびしろしかないわ
subtitles.english: I've got nothing but room to grow

subtitles.original: 俺らまだ　のびしろしかないわ
subtitles.english: We still have nothing but room to grow

subtitles.original: 悪者扱い　して来た街で
subtitles.english: In the town that treated me like a villain

subtitles.original: 悪者扱い　して来た大人へ
subtitles.english: To the adults who treated me like a villain

subtitles.original: 変わりゆくこれ　片身の中で
subtitles.english: Things are changing within this narrow space

subtitles.original: 尋ねても答えなら　イェイ　イェイ　イェイ　イェイ
subtitles.english: Even if I ask, the answer is yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah

subtitles.original: 去る者追わない　引き際引いて
subtitles.english: I don't chase those who leave, drawing a line

subtitles.original: 丸く収めたい　角食いなして
subtitles.english:
I want to settle things smoothly,
dodging the rough edges

subtitles.original: 鏡の中で　笑ってるお前
subtitles.english: You, laughing in the mirror

subtitles.original: 括れやしなかった　たったの三文字で
subtitles.english: Couldn't be summed up in just three characters

subtitles.original: 日々を待つなら足取りで
subtitles.english: Waiting for the days with my footsteps

subtitles.original: 自分の歩幅で闊歩して
subtitles.english: Walking proudly with my own stride

subtitles.original: たまに誤魔化し　また胡麻化し
subtitles.english: Occasionally deceiving, then deceiving again

subtitles.original: 割と適当だった段取りで
subtitles.english: With plans that were fairly haphazard

subtitles.original: やっとわかってきたかも
subtitles.english: I might have finally started to understand

subtitles.original: このポンコツの操縦の仕方を
subtitles.english: How to pilot this piece of junk

subtitles.original: 十九の時に不意に来た便り
subtitles.english: The news that came suddenly when I was nineteen

subtitles.original: もっとすがすがしい気持ち
subtitles.english: A much more refreshing feeling

subtitles.original: 隅田川にかかる
subtitles.english: Stretching across the Sumida River

subtitles.original: 勝鬨橋を渡る
subtitles.english: Crossing the Kachidoki Bridge

subtitles.original: 左手にスカイツリー
subtitles.english: Skytree on the left

subtitles.original: 右手に東京タワー
subtitles.english: Tokyo Tower on the right

subtitles.original: 俺はその真ん中
subtitles.english: And I'm right in the middle

subtitles.original: サボり方とか甘え方とか　逃げ方とか言い訳の仕方とか
subtitles.english:
How to slack off, how to be pampered,
how to run away, how to make excuses

subtitles.original: やっと覚えてきた　身につけてきた　柔らかい頭
subtitles.english:
I've finally started to learn,
I've acquired a flexible mind

subtitles.original: 格好の付け方　助詞のこき方　鼻の据え方　愛想の振り方
subtitles.english:
How to look cool, how to use particles,
how to settle my nose, how to act friendly

subtitles.original: 油の乗りだした　煮え滾ってきた　だらしない身体
subtitles.english:
My body is getting greased up, it's starting to boil,
this slovenly body

subtitles.original: 幸せの耐震速度は
subtitles.english: The earthquake-resistant speed of happiness is

subtitles.original: 早くなるばかり
subtitles.english: Only getting faster

subtitles.original: 傷が癒えていく速度は
subtitles.english: The speed at which wounds heal is

subtitles.original: 遅くなるばかり
subtitles.english: Only getting slower

subtitles.original: 人に期待をしないのが
subtitles.english: Not expecting anything from people

subtitles.original: 今の俺の強み
subtitles.english: Is my strength right now

subtitles.original: 手を引いても進める距離が
subtitles.english: The distance I can cover even if I pull back

subtitles.original: 育って魂魂
subtitles.english: Has grown, soul, soul

subtitles.original: 身の程を知るほどに
subtitles.english: The more I know my place

subtitles.original: 胸を張り　いつものに
subtitles.english: I puff out my chest, doing the usual

subtitles.original: でも時に下で背伸び
subtitles.english: But sometimes I stretch myself thin underneath

subtitles.original: やっと大人げないができる歳
subtitles.english: Finally at an age where I can act immature

subtitles.original: 小さな枠組み　ただの筋
subtitles.english: A small framework, just a plot

subtitles.original: 縛られずにでも腹くくり
subtitles.english: Without being bound, but with determination

subtitles.original: あの日の俺が立ち止まることに　デカく聳え立つ
subtitles.english:
To the fact that I stopped that day,
it stands tall and huge

subtitles.original: 隅田川にかかる
subtitles.english: Stretching across the Sumida River

subtitles.original: 勝鬨橋を渡る
subtitles.english: Crossing the Kachidoki Bridge

subtitles.original: 重なるスカイツリー
subtitles.english: Overlapping Skytrees

subtitles.original: 東京タワーど真ん中の頼りない背中
subtitles.english: Tokyo Tower, the unreliable back right in the middle

subtitles.original: サボり方とか甘え方とか　逃げ方とか言い訳の仕方とか
subtitles.english:
How to slack off, how to be pampered,
how to run away, how to make excuses

subtitles.original: やっと覚えてきた　身につけてきた　柔らかい頭
subtitles.english:
I've finally started to learn,
I've acquired a flexible mind

subtitles.original: 格好の付け方　助詞のこき方...
subtitles.english: How to look cool, how to use particles...
